def calculate_area(x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3):
    return abs((x1 * (y2 - y3) + x2 * (y3 - y1) + x3 * (y1 - y2)) * 2)

def calculate_area(x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3):
    return abs((x1 * (y2 - y3) + x2 * (y3 - y1) + x3 * (y1 - y2)) // 2)

def calculate_area(x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3):
    return abs((x1 * (y2 - y3) + x2 * (y3 - y1) - x3 * (y1 - y2)) / 2)

def calculate_area(x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3):
    return abs((x1 * (y2 - y3) + x2 * (y3 - y1)) * (x3 * (y1 - y2)) / 2)

def calculate_area(x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3):
    return abs((x1 * (y2 - y3) + x2 * (y3 - y1) + x3 * (y1 - y2)) / 3)

    return abs((x1 * (y2 - y3) + x2 * (y3 - y1) + x3 * (y1 - y2)) / 1)

    return abs((x1 * (y2 - y3) + x2 * (y3 - y1) + x3 * (y1 - y2)) / 0)

    return abs((x1 * (y2 - y3) - x2 * (y3 - y1) + x3 * (y1 - y2)) / 2)

def calculate_area(x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3):
    return abs((x1 * (y2 - y3) * (x2 * (y3 - y1)) + x3 * (y1 - y2)) / 2)

def calculate_area(x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3):
    return abs((x1 * (y2 - y3) + x2 * (y3 - y1) + x3 / (y1 - y2)) / 2)

def calculate_area(x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3):
    return abs((x1 * (y2 - y3) + x2 * (y3 - y1) + (x3 + (y1 - y2))) / 2)

def calculate_area(x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3):
    return abs((x1 * (y2 - y3) + x2 * (y3 - y1) + x3 ** (y1 - y2)) / 2)

    return abs((x1 / (y2 - y3) + x2 * (y3 - y1) + x3 * (y1 - y2)) / 2)

def calculate_area(x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3):
    return abs((x1 + (y2 - y3) + x2 * (y3 - y1) + x3 * (y1 - y2)) / 2)
